job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>This is a 6-month contract role, with potential extension up to two years.</p><p><br></p><p>Job Responsibilities:</p><p>- Develop user-facing features while taking an active role in designing and improving the UX for Assistant Studio</p><p>- Build new features and maintain tools for the Assistant Studio - Model Factory, including tools and services for training data management, model training, inference etc.</p><p>- Collaborate with other engineers to improve the efficiency and usability of existing tools</p><p><br></p><p>Skills Must Have:</p><p>- 3+ years' of Full Stack web development experience</p><p>- Experience with web applications and large scale front end development</p><p>- Proficient with programming languages like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP</p><p>- Experience with modern JavaScript libraries and frameworks like React and Redux</p><p>- Experience with git or other source control</p><p>- Strong motivation and product sense</p><p>- Verbal and written communication skills, problem solving skills, customer service and interpersonal skills.</p><p>- Ability to work independently and manage one’s time.</p><p>- Ability to troubleshoot issues and make system changes as needed to resolve issue.</p><p><br></p><p>Nice to Have:</p><p>- Experience in Python is a plus</p><p>- Experience and interest in NPL is a plus</p><p><br></p><p>Education/Experience:</p><p>Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering, information system or relevant field required.</p>
